name: the idea of you
description:
Suggested price is enough for a Venti Hot Cocoa at Starbucks and IS OPTIONAL. If you want to enable my love for cocoa, I won't complain. ;)

Back in February or March 2017, while dealing with one of many bouts of depression and anxiety I started working on this little thing. It was meant to be sort of part journal / therapy for myself, part weird nonsensical thing.

Now, in August 2017 I'm releasing the full version which is basically the finished game. It's small, rather odd and pointless but, it's the thing I made to help myself through a rough spot and I figured I'd put it out there.

The humanoid sprites are based off of myself. I essentially recorded myself walking in place from each side and rotoscoped it. The audio is a mix of built-in RPGMaker MV effects and original sounds/"songs" I made myself.
